name: PositiveThinking
0:
”Alexa, open positive thinking”
”Alexa, launch positive thinking”
”Alexa, launch positive thinking, and tell me a quote”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: positive thinking
des:
A positive attitude can impact every aspect of your life. People who maintain a positive approach to life situations and challenges will be able to overcome tricky situations. 

Do you ever feel like you have a bad day? Positive thinking, is the process of not thinking negatively. The skill provides users with Positive Thinking Quotes. The skill contains motivational quotes, and inspirational messages.

Over 50+ positive thinking quotes. To use, simply ask:

"Alexa, launch positive thinking"
"Alexa, open positive thinking"
"Alexa, play positive thinking"
"Alexa, open positive thinking, and tell me a quote"

If you have any motivational quotes feel free to let me know, and I will get them added:
http://twitter.com/VikingSkullApps
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
